page.title: 16Housing
page.content: The main settlement of the area is centred around{Bolsover.}The oldest buildings which are still used as houses are found around the{Market {Place,}some of them dating from the {17th century.}Many houses were built around{1900}when the collieries were first opened. The village of{New {Bolsover}was built in the 1890's by the{Bolsover Colliery Company.}In the 20th century the Council has built over 1200 houses and over 150 warden controlled flats/bungalows for senior citizens. A new development of Tarmac Homes has just started on New Station Road, prices about Â£30,000. In our group,{7}children live in houses built from{1890-1914, 8}in houses built from{1919-39, 9}in houses built from{1945-65}and{7}in houses built from{1965-85.}Charlotte lives on Hill Top in a house{200}years old.
